game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Find the lost temple and retrieve the ancient artifact.
game.description: A powerful artifact has been lost within the long-abandoned temple. The tribe's shaman has asked for your help to recover it.

tasks.objective: Reach the entrance of the lost temple.
tasks.description: Navigate through the jungle and find the entrance of the lost temple.

tasks.objective: Solve the puzzle to unlock the inner chamber.
tasks.description: Use your wits to solve the ancient puzzle that unlocks the inner chamber.
tasks.location: Inner Chamber of the Lost Temple

tasks.description: Once inside, retrieve the ancient artifact and prepare for your return journey.
tasks.location: Treasure Room of the Lost Temple
